column3:
“WOW!!!

My husband made this into a tea for me to help combat insomnia. Not only was it the best sleep I've had in years, but it relieved my muscle soreness/stiffness as well. I felt pretty good when I woke up the next morning, which is really saying something when you have Parkinson's Disease. Truly amazing!”
“Soo bomb I'm in a Euphoria! 😵 indica dominant. Powerful strain!”

“Great hybrid strain 
Great for intercourse
Smooth hits from the bong
Not harsh. 

Available in clubs here in San Fernando Valley.

-s600”
“For me this strain helped my insomnia the most. PR is straight knock-out gas if you would like to go to sleep. it relaxes the muscles and eases mental tension as well. Give you the I feel heavy
column4: but I'm gliding around" feeling that is known with indicas.”"

column3: “Taste's delicious! Fruity flavor that eases muscle spasms. 🍓🍒 LOVE it!”
“-BLACK BELT BUD- WOW! This shit is truly purple. I've never seen such a purple strain. The nuggets were almost black they were so dark in color. I hope I can get a good photo to ppost...”
“It's good but need more of the Purple taste then white rhino”

“Wow got this example of power from CDXX Boutique. ..and damn this thing in low doses is the bomb. Getting ready to fight off sleep now. ..was real good around the bonfire and this same doob has been put out 4 times and shit each time it's been a heavy hitting beast. Low doses are best for pain management please remember y'all”
“It's good but need more of the Purple taste then white rhino”
“I suffer from crushing social anxiety and depression, but while smoking this all that is lifted away. Simply speechless 🙌🏻”
“It was alright. Decently strong, but tended to give me a headache afterwards. Got the job done!”

“I did not quite feel any relieving effects from this strain, definitely given the impression it would be strong by the smell, the appearance and rating at the dispensary. It was like any average - sub par strain. I only became a little buzzed and it wasn’t for very long.”
“Great taste mellow effects best price at Burlingame Nector”

“Upon arriving at the procurer’s establishment, I realized I smelled a lavender scent with a slight pungency and skunkiness about 10 feet away from the closed front door. This was definitely some, ‘loud’ flower but in a sweeter, more floral sense than the typical Skunk and O.G. profiles that are more common. When smelling these flower buds closer, the pungency of the White Rhino can definitely be detected along with l...”
“this bud is a pretty purp. smells good, not overbearing at all. fruity taste. good relaxer, takes away sress, chronic pain. makes you feel lifted.”

“I'm having surgery tomorrow to remove a large ovarian cyst. This strain has been invaluable to my effort to manage my pain. The cyst causes me to have severe nausea/vomiting and lose my appetite, so this strain helps me keep food down, and helps me actually want to eat it. It almost works better than the prescription painkillers I was given.”

“Fresh, earthy taste. Has a smooth transition as it eases you into an uplifting eurphria that lasts for 3 hours. Very calming and relaxed, (slightly) sedative come down. This predominantly-indica hybrid is perfect after a long day or before bedtime.”
“a bit lack luster in taste. but co soldering I'm a bigger fan of sativas I would recommend this for a nice bed time / anti depressant very fruity smell and beautiful coating of sugar”
“awesome strain! a little spicy when it hits your tongue but hella mellow after purple rhino kicks in! bought from Nectar Hillsdale in PDX - I highly recommend them for all medicinal mj needs!”
“Super smooth and packs a punch. I’m definitely in “chill mode” with this one. Good strain.”
“Great strain. Has a nice purple to it. It is very easy to smoke, and gets you real high!”
“Purple in all ways, after a little bit of this stuff you forget what color it is until you see it”
“Lovely strain. Tastes amazing, very smooth. Wonderful effect. Great for evening before bed.”
“My personal favorite, got it straight out of Colorado, with some Bruce Banner. Can't wait to get some again.”

“5.0 top of the top if not the best. The description by leafly is spot on. White Rhino" was my favorite at my first dispensary (like they said high thc% for patients ailments) mixed w purps another of my favorites literally (I love the color ect). Mix in a little sativa in the bowel and your good white rhino makes the hi last long time while the purps intensify it.”"
